function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of need-based initiatives and geopolitical cooperation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on informal sector workers and migrant workers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased incidence of suicide among vulnerable populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious disease spread due to lockdown-related limitations on economic activities and livelihoods","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health inequalities due to existing social stratification and resource sharing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in domestic violence cases and mental health issues due to social isolation and lockdowns","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Emerging issues related to jobs and income of millions of people, social safety net, future of income support schemes, the burden on women, and the plight of migrants and informal sector workers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to resources and sudden disappearance of informal sectors of employment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developmental impacts on health, education, gender, economy, politics, and the environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of health risks, injuries, diseases, disabilities, psychological problems, and deaths in pandemics","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemics on human life and the global economy","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate and inaccurate covid-19 information in literature","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of grey literature in the study","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Language limitation to english","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through literature search and review of covid-19 related materials.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of access to healthcare","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poverty leading to increased vulnerability to contagious diseases","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak rural infrastructure exacerbating disease spread","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges related to employment and income of millions of people","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear and anxiety due to economic shocks and recession","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of travel constraints and quarantine measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to the virus among field workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation and work environment concerns for remote workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of training in covid-19 signs and symptoms, social distancing, and hygiene practices.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication leading to lack of updates and information for furloughed employees.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced productivity and workforce shortages due to challenges faced during remote work, isolation, and lack of equipment.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference for living in gated communities during pandemics may lead to increased concentration of individuals in a confined space, raising the risk of disease spread.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouragement of others to move to gated communities may lead to societal segregation and inequitable access to resources and amenities during pandemics.","category":"Social and Cultural risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on the gated community environment for safety during pandemics may lead to complacency in implementing broader public health measures.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation in built environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sanitation and hygiene practices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Testing the antiviral efficacy of surfacewise 2 in liquid form using astm e1052 standard test method.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using unvalidated research data to guide clinical practice.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 in crowded or confined spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global shortages of personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment due to workplace closures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 transmission in workplace settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ppe usage and availability","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of education and awareness on ipc measures","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assessment of workplace measures for preventing and controlling sars-cov-2 transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of mental health outcomes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of sars-cov and mers-cov studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of inexperienced researchers for screening","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-low"},{"name":"Discrepancies in extracted data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of bias in quality assessment","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low quality of evidence in cross-sectional studies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or biased data in modelling studies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discrepancies in quality assessment resolved mutually between reviewers","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of random-effects meta-analysis method without considering common effect size","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases due to community transmission rate during intervention period","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
